title: ArmedForces.io
description: Pick your favorite guns from the equipments section! Enter the battling field in ArmedForces.io, a 3D FPS game. Try to unlock new weapons for your loadouts!

ArmedForces.io

By OnlineGames.io


Prepare for epic battles! ArmedForces.io is a 3D action game where you will combat enemy forces on various game maps with multiple game mode choices. Arrange your loadouts from eight unique weapons at your disposal.

Try to survive among fierce rivals alongside your team or against everyone else. Furthermore, you can customize your arsenal with silencers or weapon sights as you progress in this first-person shooter game!

  • WASD or the Arrow Keys: Move
  • Left-Shift: Run
  • Spacebar: Slide
  • Number Keys: Change Weapons
  • Left-Mouse Button: Fire
  • Right-Mouse Button: Aim
  • E or F: Interact / Pick up a Weapon
  • G: Throw a Dynamite
  • H: Use MedKit
  • T: Chat
  • L: Toggle Cursor Lock
  • C: Crouch
  • N: Show Scoreboard
  • ESC: Pause

How to Play ArmedForces.io

  • Start with arranging your loadout from the Equipments section before participating in any online battles in this io game.
  • There are eight weapons of any kind to unlock in this section. You can pick the Micro Mac-10 or the R840. Or, you can choose the SKS.
  • You are free to enter any battle with two different loadouts with these eight options. After grabbing your guns, you are ready for intense battles!
  • You can quickly enter the battling field by clicking the "Battle" button. Choose the game mode you want to play and tap on "Confirm and Play."
  • Whatever path you choose, your main goal in this multiplayer game is survival!

Capture the Flag or Bomb Defuse?

ArmedForces.io offers you 5 game modes. And each mode has a different purpose. In the Team Deathmatch mode, you will fight against the enemies alongside your team. You will try to be the last soldier standing in the Free For All mode.

On the other hand, you need to take the flag from your opponent's area and bring it to your area in Capture the Flag mode. Try to explore each of the given modes in this action game!

  • Team Deathmatch 
  • Free for All
  • Capture the Flag
  • Bomb Defuse 
  • Gun Game

Equipment Section in ArmedForces.io

We have listed below what you can find in the equipment section:

  • MP5
  • Micro Mac-10
  • R840
  • AKM 
  • SG554
  • Minimi
  • SKS 
  • M40A3
  • P226
  • Combat Knife 
  • Basic Armor
  • Frag Grenade 
  • Syringe

Check Your Stats!

In the profile section, you can change the nickname and load/save code (only experience can be saved through this code. You can replace your current load code with another one that loads a higher value.) And it will appear the following statistics:

  • Kills
  • Deaths
  • Scores
  • K/D Rate
  • Win
  • Lose
  • W/L Rate
  • Games Played
  • Total Play Time
  • Headshot Counts
  • Knife Kills
  • Assist Counts

Developer

ArmedForces.io was developed by FreezeNova.

Similar Online Games

Crazy Strike Force may also be of interest to you. Create a style for your soldier and enter the battling arena with all your might in the game. Use additional skills to eliminate your enemies more powerfully.

You may look for the action games online tag on OnlineGames.io for further options. Our community constantly tries to expand its online game range. Keep coming back to discover new and thrilling games!
